about.what-is-desc: Colombo-Mexican Company with corporative place in Mexico D.F
about.distribution-system: Xifra creates an effective dstribution system based on emerald mining, carving, jewellery creation and export of the same and in this way be able to distribute a percentage of the profits to its customers.
about.company-mission: Our mission is give to our customers effective ways to get profits using our distribution system, so like the exclusive use of our gemstone.
about.company-goal: Our principal goal is to control the emerald and rare jewels market for the american, european and asian market, offering an aggressive but balanced payment plan.
about.invest-title: Invest in emeralds and earn in cryptocurrencies
about.invest-company: Xifra is the first company that creates an online investment system based on emeralds trade.
about.our-company: Our company is legally constituted in Mexico and it's regulated by the Fintech Lay. Actually we have corporative place in Mexico City, in the Polanco town, CONCRETA TOWER (9th floor).
about.commercial: Xifra make commercial activities with Colombian Emeralds under Strategic Partnership with recognized Companies in this guild.
about.package-created: We've created a variety of investment packages, that give to our customers the posibility of invest since 50 USD to 50.000 USD and get automatic returns between 0,4% and 1% on weekdays, until complete 200% of their investment (100% Equity, 100% Returns)
about.pay-way: All investements and withdrawals will be done in Bitcoin or USDT
